verbs.description: “ [ARG1: The double standard] [V: is] [ARG2: truly astounding] , ” Melania Trump ’s spokeswoman Stephanie Grisham stated on her behalf .
“ [ARG1: The double standard is truly astounding] , ” [ARG0: Melania Trump ’s spokeswoman Stephanie Grisham] [V: stated] [ARGM-LOC: on her behalf] .
